name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI Copilot for Sheets - by Arcwise

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use the AI behind ChatGPT to explain, transform, and ingest data in Sheets with text commands! Just press Cmd+Shift+1 / Ctrl+Shift+1

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Arcwise 2.0 is an AI-powered data analytics extension embedded directly in your Google Sheets. Instantly refine data analysis, identify key drivers and trends, create graphs and visualizations, build reports and more — all without leaving your spreadsheet.

Trusted by industry leaders like NZXT and Verkada, Arcwise has reduced reporting time of up to 80% for some of our existing users. 

Key Features:

💬 Ask questions to get pivots, graphs, and auto-generated insights
📄 Upload PDFs and automatically extract data into tables
➗ Use $AI.TRANSFORM, $AI.CLASSIFY, and $AI.EXTRACT functions to transform text with GPT

Ready to get started? Explore our top use cases:

🔍 Track weekly business reviews and drill down on key metrics 
📈 Build sales reports and lead scoring dashboards with slick graphs and visuals  
🔮 Enhance demand forecasting processes and optimize inventory management 

Arcwise 2.0 is free for download and use. Experience Arcwise’s full features and capabilities today! Learn more on our website: arcwise.app
